summary: Fixed meshes for alternative black panties
descriptionHtml:
Fixed meshes for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor[/url] (RMA)
This PantyFix have all of RMA's armor with fishnet panties, check the screenshots! If you only want it on certain armor sets you can choose.

Two versions. One for the crafted armor only, and one who also replace vanilla.

[color=red]Replaces the files of RMA, all rules for RMA applies.[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor's[/url] black panties are set without the transparency option. These are the 3.2 body meshes all with transparency activated to use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=51295]remodeled[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=51297]substitution[/url].

Requirements are [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente Female Body Mod CBBEv3[/url] installed.

Install by mod manager or copy the content to your skyrim/data folder, replace existing. You must have everything else installed prior to this.

Example of file content:
\Data\meshes\armor\ (\bandit \daedric \draug \dwarven etc.)
\Data\meshes\clothes\forswornarmor\000forswornarmorf_0.nif
\Data\meshes\clothes\forswornarmor\000forswornarmorf_1.nif
If you find any error please report. No known errors.

Changelog:
v1.0 - Release
V1.1 - Major changes
-Update to RMA 2.5
-Included OGFN Fix. No longer required
-NMM friendly setup
-Compressed right
-Added ReadMe
-New screenshots
v1.2 - Updates
-Updated for RMA 3.2
-2 new screenshots
-StandaloneTransparent set back to alpha, Thongs in RMA serve the purpose better.

Uploaded with permission from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3100012]MAK07[/url], Thank you. And thank you OGFN-TEX! And thank you [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3330686]Caliente[/url] for the wonderful body. And thank [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2310979]fallout3nexus987[/url] for guiding this fix.

[color=yellow][size=+4]Optional File[/size][/color]

Standalone of the transparent panty.

NMM friendly. Require [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente Female Body Mod CBBEv3[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180]CBBEv3M Body Replacer[/url]. Maybe the fleshlings item from RMA can be used instead of v3M.

Item name are "Black Panty (Transparent)"

You need to use console to get it. Type: help panty in the console and use player.additem to get it.

Changelog:
v1.0 - Alpha release
v1.1 - Alpha updated
-Separate armor slot, wear with anything!
-New Screenshot

Known bugs:
-Orc Armor Icon
-No location in game
-Possible exxessive nif blocks
-Possible it will only suit 1 certain body type
author: ibble
